contents:
Welcome to Season 13 of TNS! This season is coming with some changes to the normal SMP, which this guide will walk you through.

The biggest change is that we are debuting a new system called

This is a system that allows you to team up with other players in an organized way. You can still make your own base, gather your own resources, and do what you want, but you will be encouraged to spend more time interacting with your neighbours and the server as a whole.

Each nation lives in an exclusive set of biomes, and has its own themes, personalities, and priorities. Joining a nation is highly encouraged, as they will be given the power to enforce their territorial claims against players from other nations.

However, you can be

Being Nationless will relegate you to a frozen wasteland in The South. You will not have the right to build anywhere except in this neutral zone, but you will be free to go it completely on your own, without anyone telling you what to do.
